Name: Oil Maker (PH)
Description: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Maschine stellt aus zugefügten Gegenstände Öl zum Kochen her.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.it: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Эта машина превращает дополнительные предметы в масло для приготовления пищи.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This machine turns additional items into oil for cooking.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这台机器将额外的物品变成油来烹饪。
